title: DSLR Camera
description: 24MP digital camera with 4K video recording, built-in Wi-Fi, and advanced autofocus. Ideal for photography enthusiasts who want sharp details and vibrant colors in every shot.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 12 hours of continuous playtime, and a compact design that makes it easy to carry anywhere, indoors or outdoors.

title: Air Purifier
description: Smart HEPA filter air purifier that removes 99.97% of allergens, dust, smoke, and pollutants. Designed for medium to large rooms, ensuring clean and fresh air every day.

title: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with blue switches for a tactile typing experience. Features ergonomic design, customizable lighting, and durable keycaps for gamers and coders.

title: Smart TV
description: 50-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR10 support, immersive sound, and built-in streaming apps. Perfect for movies, gaming, and seamless binge-watching sessions.

title: Robot Vacuum
description: Smart robot vacuum cleaner with intelligent navigation, self-charging dock, and app control. Effortlessly cleans carpets, tiles, and wooden floors without manual effort.

title: Action Camera
description: Compact waterproof action camera with 4K recording, advanced image stabilization, and wide-angle lens. Built for adventurers who love capturing extreme sports and travel moments.

title: Wireless Earbuds
description: Noise-cancelling wireless earbuds with Bluetooth 5.0, crystal-clear sound, and 24-hour battery life. Comes with a compact charging case and sweat-resistant design for workouts.

title: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with NVIDIA RTX graphics, Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Designed for smooth gameplay, video editing, and multitasking.

title: Smartwatch
description: Stylish fitness smartwatch with heart-rate monitoring, step tracking, and notifications. Lightweight design with multiple sport modes and up to 7 days battery life.
